forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain before 5am. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 37. Southwest wind around 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

forecast.name: Friday
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly sunny, with a high near 58. West wind 9 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph.

weather_report:
In the depths of the night, Boston wraps itself in a cloak of clouds and coolness, with only a hint of rain that may come and go before dawn. The air is crisp, carrying whispers of the approaching day while a light southwest breeze rustles the stillness. As your morning unfolds, the clouds linger but give way to the promise of sun, transforming into a partly sunny expanse by midday. The high will treat you to a comfortable warmth, a reminder of spring's embrace hovering around fifty-eight degrees.

As you step out into this emerging day, consider dressing in layers; a lightweight jacket will provide just enough comfort against the memory of night’s chill. A brisk stroll along your favorite streets could be invigorating, perhaps a quiet visit to a local café where the aroma of freshly brewed coffee mingles with the sounds of early risers. Delve into the simple art of people-watching, or perhaps bring a book along to savor while the world begins to buzz around you. The day holds a beauty in its steadily revealing clarity, a backdrop inviting you to absorb each moment with quiet appreciation.
